content.detailedDescription: I was awake just watching tv waiting for the cross-over from 2014 to 2015 and i live in the south of nairobi in a place called nyayo highrise estate which is a community of over 20 apartment blocks. so most people in the estate were awake waiting for the cross-over and at precisely 12:00 midnight the whole estate was a  buzz with excited screams as people started shouting "happy new year" ,i live on the top floor of my apartment which faces the west of nairobi and gives me an interrupted panoramic view of the western and north western nairobi skyline  so i peeped outside my widow to look down at the commotion of the exited residents ushering in the new year and stood their for roughly 3 minutes when something caught my eye to my right about 45 degrees to the horizon and from where i was at 2 o'clock position, at first i thought it was an aircraft as it was glowing reddish and moving in a straight line , i turned and tracked its movement when i then noticed it wasn't flashing like an aircraft's strobe lights but was a constant reddish glow which kind of dimmed and then went brighter without going off , the object just moved in a straight line before abruptly quickly making a 90 degree turn and zooming off at a very high speed and vanishing out of sight.
content.summary: Ufo sighted towards the nw of nairobi

content.detailedDescription:
Back yard playing pool with three other guys
i went outside from the garage to relieve myself and i look up and there it was
i first thought maybe police helicopter lights so i call the others guys to come out of the garage
the object just hover still letting us just stare at it then it just took off again with no noise
the. main thing i thought about later was. wow this thing was so visible and seeing the shape so clearly and most of all no noise and hovering!
like i said it just took off
content.summary: Saw triangle shape ufo with orange red yellow lights hovering over me. no sound of engines

content.detailedDescription: I was working at a restaurant, shift was almost over and i was taking out the trash. i noticed a large light as if there were 2 moons in the sky that night. before taking a good look i pinched myself, slapped myself and spun around in a circle just to make sure it was actually there. this thing was huge, small city size possibly, it hung in the sky as quiet as a cloud. the shape was odd. looked like 2 almonds pointy side facing away from each other and the large ends were connected by a sphere. not sure if it was emitting light or reflecting moon light, but that was about the color. it looked as if it had metal scales almost as a texture, however they were not as uniform as a fish or lizard. after watching for a few seconds i had a feeling like it knew i was watching and it went dark like someone turned off a light switch.  has anyone ever seen anything else like this?
content.summary: The size was scary large,  the shape was odd and i would like a response to see if i'm the only one.  looked like 2 almonds  pointy side out linked by a sphere. texture reminded me of scales

content.detailedDescription: I had recently been seperated from active duty from the us navy stationed in charleston s.C. and had been assigned to the nuclear submarine services. i had moved to savannah, georgia and was sitting in my home when my wife alerted me to this strange light moving in the sky to the north. i went out and observed this light as it left it's hovering position and moved south at an extremely fast speed. to my knowledge at the time mankind had nothing that could move that fast not even a missile. in just a matter of a couple of seconds it was out of sight. we stood there wondering what in the world it could have been when it reappeared moving south to north and as it approached the location where i first saw it, it suddenly did a 90 degree turn to the west and kept going in the direction toward macon where warner robbins air force is located. there was at the time a russian ship tied up at a pier in savannah supposedly for some types of emergency repairs. i wasn't convinced that it was just a coincidence that that ship just happened to be there at the same. i immediately contacted hunter air force base located in savannah and told by the duty officer that there had been no radar detection and the same at warner robbins. not satisfied with that i then called and spoke with the on-duty officer at norad at cheyenne mountain and told the same thing. no radar contact detected!!! i have never believed that and until now i have not spoken of it since that night. i could be trusted with a top secret clearance and work on this country's first line of defense against nuclear attack namely fleet ballistic missile submarines but i couldn't be believed when i reported these sightings to the air force. it kinda leaves a very sour taste in my mouth. it happened and no one will ever convince me i didn't see it with my own two eyes!!!
content.summary: Observed object moving extremely fast north to south then again in reverse to first location making 90 degree turn to west and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my girlfriend were sitting on our back porch, in keswick va when very slowly a black triangle with 3 white lights moved over us very slowly around 40mph i waived and gave two thumbs up very impressive it was totally silent, i could have hit it with a rock i will never forget it. it was very real no question what we saw, i do believe its ours however i know now there are aliens all over or solar system even on that comet rosetta landed on, our moon all over. i've seen all ineed to see that we live in a very interesting time. and harrp i think is a gun to shoot at them, as you can see from one of the sts's video. i hope this may help i put off telling anyone but then i saw in the paper where someone ekes in maryland saw the same thing, i feel very fortunate to have witnessed this, hope to be part of what's happening one day

thanks
[name removed/cms/dr]
content.summary: Black triangle or tr3b

content.detailedDescription: Good morning to all! for a long time, i've been ancious to tell someone about what i and the mother of my child witness on one of the flights we took from boston to puerto rico over the atlantic ocean, probaly about and hour and half before arriving to puerto rico. after taking a few shots of the clear-puffy clouds with our digital camera, a scenery over the atlantic ocean, the minute we decided to conserved battery power and shutting the camera off, at least one or two minutes after, we both witness a tringular-dome shape silvery ufo spacecraft lifted up from the atlantic ocean and hovered next to our twa flight to puerto rico.  once it lifted up, it stayed hovering next to our aircraft for about 5 or 6 minutes, then it moved at a straight forward speed to probaly i would say 100 to 200 feet but staying next to the twa aircraft.  once this thing was hovering next to our plane, i stood up with my seatbelt strapped, and looked around to see if someone had there windows opened but i guess we were the only ones, next i looked to my right side passenger, but then again, everyone was to bussy reading newspaper and books. i wanted to confirmed this with one of the flight attendents but unfortunately, they seemed to be in the kitchen i guess cleaning and organizing before decending.  so while my partner was still looking, the ufo kind of sped away towards upward into space at an incredible speed, something we have never in our lives have seen before.  i figure i would tell one of the flight attendents but i was to way shock what we saw, thinking that maybe i would sound to them to crazy.  but, till this day, i still think and wonder that we, we are not alone in this planet, to me, they have been here and living here under our own noses.  i wish i could draw here what we saw so you'll have a preety good idea of the shap and colors it represented that day.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed it at 38,000 feets above sea level/silvery/various colors of lights/triangular-dome shape/uplifted from the atlantic ocean at incredible speed then disappeared into space.

content.detailedDescription: Told father to turn south and view object. orb stayed hovering perfectly still for 5 minutes. then like it had a clone device, vanished from view. our position in boat was in main channel of hudson river just south of rip van winkle bridge. second sighting was nov 1975 crossing rip van winkle bridge at a car crossing the bridge itself. accompanied my my late mom i saw something above the super structure of the bridge. very cold dark night. no car behind me i stopped briefly and rolled down window. no sound as a i viewed 5 football shaped dark metal lightless orbs drifting north approximately 50 feet above us. no sound but the started to block note lights from the city of hudson. total time until we left and continued across bridge.....3minutes.
content.summary: Fishing in bass boat. turned in seat north to south. dull grey orb in sky for area minutes

content.detailedDescription:
At first i thought it was a large balloon, but when i got closer i noticed no lines attached to it and it was stationary.  then we noticed smoke like
emissions from the object.  but then i thought smoke will rise, but this was falling to the ground.  like vapor from dry ice.  i watched it for over a half hour and it didn't move. we were out in amish country just riding around looking at the scenery, this was on a back road (gravel) when we saw this.  i stopped the car and watched it for about a half  hour then we had to move to let another car coming up behind us.

how long it was there i don't know because we had to move on to let traffic continue.
the object looked to be at least75 feet round, and the emission from it was falling to the ground like smoke.

later some time in oct. 2014 we were going to the store to pick up some needed items and it was around 9:pm and dark and we noticed some lights in the sky which for red,blue,green and yellow. it was very high but it didn't move,  we drove around for an hour and a half trying to get closer to it but we couldn't get any roads to take us closer to this object.  the next day i went out to the area in which we saw this object, to satisfy my self that there were no towers in this area. being a pilot my self i knew this was not a plane and towers do not have different color lights.  what it was i do not know.
content.summary: Very large sphire

content.detailedDescription: We were in the yard of my girlfriends house. i was letting the dogs out while 3 others were out there for cigaretts. while talking i looked up to see a red-orange object coming towards us. it looked at first to be a plane or helicopter. we soon realized it wasn't. no man made flying vehicle glowed like this. it had no wings,blades or sounds. we did notice a very distant jet like sound after the object was almost out of view. the sky was crystal clear and the neighborhood was very quiet. we waited a minute to hear explosion but only silence followed. alien craft or meteor? i think a meteor or comet would have a trail??? something i'll not forget. two of us have cellphone video which is not that great and was taken after best views were past us.
content.summary: Observed from a distance, as it came towards us we realized it wasnt a manmade flying device. red orange ball of fire.Moving straight and fast

content.detailedDescription:
Walking from my car to our house between 11:30 and midnight (3/17/12) i observed a single light brighter than a star though much smaller than the moon in the eastern sky in the general direction of white top mtn. and mt. rogers.  a second light appeared in line with the first, then a third, fourth and fifth.  there may have been a sixth but i don't recall. 

the lights appeared to remain stationary in the sky for as much as a minute and then they diappeared one by one in the same order that they appeared. they seemed to move independenly moving slightly north before quickly disappearing.   

i described the event to my wife who was out of town via cell phone as it happened but did not share the story with anyone else.  until i found this site i did not know where i could share this information.  i wish i had reported it earlier but i recall the events very clearly.
content.summary: Five or six lights appeared one at a time in a line then disappeared one by one.

content.detailedDescription: We were outside for new years when we all noticed three orange/red lights going in a straight line.  they were silent and steady in the direction they were going that was northeast direction. a minute later they were followed by another single orang/red light minute later going in the same direction and altitude and speed. the last on seemed to start to change direction after it passed us. it started to climb upward until it faded away.
content.summary: Seen three orange/red lights going in a traight line n/e direction followed by a 4th light a min later

content.detailedDescription: About a year and a half ago i happened to be up late after experiencing almost a nightly assault on my person by something i can only describe as not physical but having the ability to paralyze me and assault my emotions and my mind because i never had any external scars. i just knew that i have been paralized almost nightly since childhood and have seen glimpses of being escorted out of my bedroom someone /something on each arm, sexual attacks and coersions , giants, round clouds of lights, which could only be described as ufo's. it woke me up as usual. (only recently i have stopped fighting this entity and relaxed during attacks which seem to enrage it ).I am awake but cant move and i have always fought and resisted, i could not even yell for help, i was helpless and that was the scariest part. i am 6'6" and weight 280 and this thing can and does completely immobilize , paralyze and hold me down. however, they always pass. i got up around 2;30 am which is almost always within 1 or 2 hours ,when the attacks occur . i went outside and was looking at the stars when i noticed a bright white light that was so bright it looked like a strobe light in the sky. mind you that these lights, i have now seen for over a year, and i can now point out to you on any given clear night after about 11pm. the are colors from blue, green, red white, bright white, they get bigger and brighter and then sometimes go dim. they pulse, flash glow , get brighter then dimmer . the only thing that these large orbs of light do pretty consistently is stay in the same spot in the sky every night like they have for over a year. i can usually point out 8 to 12 lights around my property in all directions but mainly in eastern sky. i never reported any of this because i thought my case was an isolated incident but after seeing a few ancient aliens,and mufon hangar one files, and some independent research, i am convinced that i am not alone in my anguish over these incidents, and there are others that i could share with who would not look at me like i had lost my mind or was crazy. i am a father of 2 kids college age. i am 51 years old and worked for 26 years in the wholesale products division industry
content.summary: Lights in the sky in the same place every night for over a year flashing strobing blinking colored lights

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was in my office on my computer. my mother was outside and she saw the lights first, so she called for me to come outside quick. so i go outside and we both observe this object. at first we thought maybe it was helicopters or planes flying in formation or maybe even fireworks. there were two reddish orange colored lights in the front, and two more lights of the same color in the back. in between these two sets of lights, there was a triangle. it had the same reddish orange lights on the three corners of the triangle. we could clearly see that the triangle was solid. it looked to be grey or maybe even black in color. there was absolutely no sound, it was completely silent. it was a stormy day all day yesterday so last night was very overcast. we could clearly see these lights and the shape of the object against the clouds in the sky. it flew directly over our neighborhood, then made an abrupt turn to the west, we observed the lights for a few more seconds before they suddenly disappeared. i'm sure other people had to have witnessed this event, as my neighborhood is next to interstate 95. this is my first time ever seeing something like this, and to see it so clearly since it was flying so low was absolutely incredible. i've always believed that ufos were real, and i am now completely sure that they do exist. my mother and i both witnessed this event and we are positive about what we saw.
content.summary: Reddish orange lights on a solid triangle on new years eve 12/31/14

content.detailedDescription: Just call me. this is a pain in the ass
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Brother saw it. seemed to follow from tatum tx to kilgore tx. object seemed to have some sort of active camo

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting outside. 8:30 pm. very clear beautiful night. bright orange like the color of fire object out of corner of my eye. residential neighborhood. approx 5000 feet in the sky. they were flying across the horizon slowly and no sound. they kept coming one after the other sometimes in tandem. i saw at least 15 of them. the flight pattern was methodical. the lights remained bright glowing deep orange. i saw a normal plane flying above these objects at about 10000 feet and could hear the plane. i did have 3 other people come outside to witness event. one guy was unimpressed and said that we are surrounded by airforce bases. okatie south carolina is where we live. none of us have ever seen anything like this and it has haunted me. 
p.S. not chinese lanterns. military drones?
content.summary: Silent. deep orange like fire. slow and steady. 15 to 20 flying on same path.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my front porch facing basically west. there was still a light glow of sunlight on the horizon but the red glow of sunset had passed. i was just looking at stars and going over recent personal events in my mind when i saw three points of white light shaped in what seemed like a triangle, thou not a perfect triangle.  they caught my eye because it seemed to me moments earlier the lights were not there.  that made me focus on them and even thou they were approximately the same intensity as an average star i never felt they were stars.  i got the distinct impression they were hovering.  at this time i was looking slightly less then northwest.  i watched them 'hover' for approximately 3 to 4 minutes. the lights then started moving from my right to left in a southeasterly direction.  at no time did i see any direction changes.  when 'hovering',the lights appeared to be a mile or more away.  when crossing in front of me they appeared to be less then a mile. as the object got closer the triangle shape became more prominent.  it was at this time i could clearly see an outline of a dark triangle shaped object with a light near each tip.  it was also now that an orange/red light in the middle became clear.  compared to houses around me the object had to be over 100 ft on each side.  at no time did i hear any sound or have any sensations. i tried to take video of the object but i could not get my phone to focus for whatever reason.  the speed of the object did not seem to be very fast compared to the ocassional f-16 that flies over.  however as the object got past due south it acclerated steadily and was out of sight in seconds.  from hover to due south on the compass was approximately one minute.  fron due south on the compass to out of visual was less then ten seconds.
content.summary: Looked exactly like photos of the tr-3b

content.detailedDescription: It's new year, i heard and ambulance so we went out then we so a light, we though it was an airplane but then it was coming close to us, then we so another one, it was glowing orange/yellow/red and sometimes pulsing. movin slow, like if it could see us. i took a video and the first one suddenly disappeared. the other one was closer, it seems like to have an aura, then the glowing stopped. we saw more than 20. they were landing and glowing. an helicopter came with a light "searching" for something (weird). i proyected light to one of them with my cellphone, it stopped and slowly disappeared. we so then with glasses to see things closer, they all had the same form and color. i felt like if they knew i was there watching. at first i was scared, but then i wanted to see more and contact them. after 1 hour or more i just went back home.
content.summary: Multiple lights descended, glowing and suddenly gone.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside listening to the new years ruckus and noticed a bright orange light moving from the n.E. object moved as if on a flight path then ascended skyward and faded out, this was repeated 3 more times by identical lights/manuevers
content.summary: 4 orange lights observed coming from n.E (chilliwack) brightened and gained altitude one after another then faded out (orange hue)

content.detailedDescription: Objects were seen flying and changing direction to the se from albany, or. pulsating lights on the objects. faint orange or red color. vanished after 12 mins.
content.summary: Lights observed to the se flying/hovering and changing direction

content.detailedDescription: Backyard to let dog out. clear & cold with bright moon. looked at moon and then saw two red lights and one white light in a triangular pattern lower left of moon. i live near an airport so at first i thought nothing of it but then i noticed the lights weren't moving. i do not know how long they were there before i noticed them, but i observed for about 15 seconds and then they just disappeared. i stood there for another 5 minutes thinking if it was a plane the lights would come back on but they did not return. there were no clouds or fog and i could see stars all around where the object had been. there was no sound.A part of me wants to dismiss as a plane but the way it just stayed in one place and then vanished was so astonishing to be believable.
content.summary: Triangular red hovering lights disappear

content.detailedDescription: It looked like what was a jet going straight up in the sky with jet streams behind it.... but wasn't moving...Then two fighter jets flew above and below it and there were a couple helicopters. and in a matter of a couple seconds the jet streams behind it disappears and it's just a shiny ball in the sky then the ball vanishes out of thin air
content.summary: Strange sighting

content.detailedDescription: 7-10k agl. gold to orange sphere w/top semicircle lights... stars were white this was a bright burnt orange to yellow gold. watched along a path to hover and seemed to be light flickering in a sequence... then disappeared. at arms length traveled 12 inches before a turn and then faded. clear skies. i came out of my house and saw this orange sphere type thing and after figuring it was not a commercial aircraft went to get my iphone. it seemed odd because of the stop/start nature along a path which seemed a straight line from the e-ne over my location. 35 yr weather experience(certified).
content.summary: Orange to dark yellow orange sphere with same color lights over santee ca

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting on the back porch when we noticed three balls of light at first coming over thetree tops. we noticed as they moved across the sky that the numbers increased to a total of 8. the lights were pulsating and a couple appear to have small changes in direction as the moved across the sky. they appeared to increase in elevation slightly then evetually just disappeared. the incedent lasting about 8 minutes from the first sighting to the last one disappearing. six lights were in the initial group and two more followed not long after the first few disappeared.
content.summary: Floating balls of light that disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
My son said look up and we both observed a triangle object with 3 red lights at the points. it was moving slowly and silently in a straight line in a ne direction. i did a video on my phone and caught very briefly what i described. it went out of range and disappeared.
if you contact me i will provide the video in person.
thanks for your attention in this matter.
content.summary: Triangle shaped object with 3 red lights at each point. silent and slow running. moving in a strsaight line.

content.detailedDescription:
1. backyard bbq 1 mile from coast. 
2. unusual orange glowing light never seen before.
3. never say anything like it.
4. smooth movement from east to west. 
5. awe.
6. disappeared rapidly.
content.summary: Bright orange lights floating through sku 4, east to west, one after the next, seemingly connected. dissappeared very fast.

content.detailedDescription: 4 glowing orange spheres. the first one was observed moving first in a straight line and then moved left and then right. it hovered for about 1 minute before changing directions one last time and then it faded out. the other 3 were seen virtually at the same time about 45 minutes after the first sighting. they were all about 1 minute apart. first in straight lines like the first and then they went in different directions. the first of the three went to the ne and then slightly changed direction to the n. it then stopped moving and hovered for about a minute and then faded out. the second and third orange glowing spheres moved to the se and to the ne separately. they both stopped and hovered for about a minute before moving straight up. these two didn't fade out like the first two. i was in my backyard when i observed these glowing orange spheres. at first i thought it was the streetlight playing a trick on my eyes since they are orange as well but whwn they flew around i realized that it could have been the street lights since you know they don't move around. i've lived next to 3 different military bases in 3 states and have lived next to commercial airports all my life so i know what a military plane/helicopter looks like even at night. it was not a  personal or commercial plane or a helicopter either. the objects made no sound either.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4 orange glowing spheres.

content.detailedDescription: While stargazing in my backyard on december 31, 2014, i looked up from my telescope at approximately 11:00 pm. in the eastern sky were two bright, orange star-like flares, hovering silently side by side roughly parrallell to the horizon. i initially thought it was a low-flying plane, but when i put on my glasses i could see that this clearly wasn't the case. i called through the back door to my wife to come see. as i called her, the objects appeared to drift apart, the left one (relative to my point of view going up and away while the right one appeared to go down and away. the objects dimmed as they drifted apart, until they disappeared from view.
content.summary: While stargazing in the backyard, i looked up from my telescope to see two bright orange lights in the eastern sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my front yard when i observed the light and this is not the first time i have seen this. i was out having a smoke when i saw an orange pulsating light about 1000 to 1500 feet in the air. i then watched as it went from the area from the pandhandle of florida the north west to the area around tampa from my self and then a couple of right angle moves and then disappeared going toward mcdill air force base to the south west of my self it went too fast for any normal plane or any thing like that unless we had one single fighter jet that can go faster then any thing i have seen in awhile . it changed direction a couple of times while moving at a very high rate of speed and then it just seemed to disappear in the direction of the base i have mentioned. i have seen these objects a few times before in this area going close to the same area. i have seen a lot of objects that i just can not explain and this really bothers me a lot. i am an ex military person and i worked on helicopters. i can tell the difference between different planes and helicopters and this is not any thing i have seen in awhile and the color of the lights are just to bright and are to bright . i don't se any thing in orangeish red or colors like that and it was really moving from about a 200 to 400 mile's ion a blink of an eye this is too fast for something that i know of that we have that they tell us about any way. i see these lights and objects a lot and in the last couple of years living in this area i have seen things that would make your skin crawl and i can not explain them. this really bothers me that there are things out there like this and the government does not say any thing about what they are or if they are even ours. i think they owe us an explination about what these objects are or if they are even ours. i know we can take it we are not cave men we can handle it so tell us what is going on . i want to know >
content.summary: Was out side to have a smoke and then it was there. it first was coming from the pandhandle of florida and then went very fast blink of and eye to the area of mcdill a.F.B.

content.detailedDescription: Above lake and tree line. have pics. nothing like i have seen before
content.summary: Multiple cross lines in a star shape

content.detailedDescription: I was at home in the kitchen and my brother called me over and go outside. i walked outside and looked up and thought to myself what is that and noticed a ruby colored ball/orb in the sky flying in a straight line in a northeastern direction and as a commercial airplane was lowering altitude coming in for a landing at baltimore washington international airport. as air plane got closer the orb pulsated and vanished
content.summary: Ruby colored
